game.name: Sunkenland
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 모듈식 기지 건설, 가라앉은 도시 탐색, 제작, 기지 방어 및 자원 및 영토를 위한 NPC 클랜의 침공이 포함된 워터월드 테마의 서바이벌 게임에 준비하세요. 물의 대재앙에 대비하시겠습니까?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for a Waterworld-themed survival game with modular base building, sunken city scavenging, crafting, base defense, and invasions of NPC clans for resources and territory. Ready for the water apocalypse?

reviewHighlights.text: Game has potential but so many things pile onto each other that it's now in an unplayable state. Since there hasn't been an update for a year I starte...
